name: Kotmale Cheddar Cheese
description: Kotmale Processed Cheddar Cheese is processed using natural Kotmale Cheddar cheese made from 100% Sri Lankan, Fresh Cow's  milk. It has a smooth texture and significant Cheddar flavour. Suitable for Vegetarians. Rs.50 cents from every 1L of fresh milk collected is contributed to a special welfare fund "Sarubima" focused on empowering Farmers children through education.      *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
